headline: JP Morgan's Stock Picks In The Power Sector Amid Regulatory Uncertainty
summary: J.P. Morgan analyst Jeremy Tonet remains constructive on the power sector, viewing it as “washed out” despite current bearish sentiment. He attributes this outlook to strong demand growth driven by broader electrification trends, industrial onshoring, and heating trends while also noting regulatory uncertainty as a key factor influencing market dynamics. Here are the analysts’ takes on some major players in the sector: Talen Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:TLN): Tonet reiterated the Overweight rating

headline: VST Stock Trading at a Premium to Industry at 19.38X: Should You Buy?
summary: Vistra stock enjoys the benefits of rising demand in its service territories. Yet, it is trading at a premium, so new investors should wait and look for a better entry point ahead.
